reviewText: I originally saw two of the three movies on PBS and enjoyed them very much.  The acting portrays the stories in a very professional way.  I am very happy to have found them to purchase.  Thank you.

I remember seeing Bearskin on PBS as a child.  It is solely responsible for my lifelong love of Grimm's fairy tales.  Davenport's interpretation of these classic tales is bar none, the best I have ever seen.
